about_the_game:
Monolit is a cooperative survival player-versus-environment game for 2 to 8 players on PC.
Explore your environment, collect resources, improve your camp and your equipment and try to survive against the creatures that inhabit this mysterious world and the stranges events that takes place there !
Play differently each game with tool specialization, skill tree, and a character customization tool to truly make your experience unique !

The game takes place on a procedurally generated map where you and your allies will have to travel through different biomes to harvest the resources necessary for your survival. But be careful not to venture too far, every night hordes of creatures will attack your base, you cannot leave it defenseless ! Communication and good organization will be your best tools during your adventure.
Victory will be yours once all the bosses are defeated !
